common.monitorYourFieldsWithRealTimeSatelliteIm: Monitor your fields with real-time satellite imagery and NDVI analysis

founders.title: Meet Our Founders
founders.subtitle: The talented team behind SmartAgroX, dedicated to revolutionizing agriculture through technology and innovation.
founders.missionText: We're on a mission to transform agriculture through smart technology. Our team combines expertise in software development, UI/UX design, and agricultural knowledge to create solutions that empower farmers.

dashboard.welcomeDescription: Transform your farming with data-driven insights, smart recommendations, and precision agriculture technology for optimal yields and sustainability.
dashboard.farmThrivingMessage: Your farm is thriving! Explore personalized insights, weather impacts, and recommendations to maximize your agricultural success today.
dashboard.optimalGrowingSeason: Current season is favorable for rice, cotton, and sugarcane.

soilLab.title: Soil Laboratory
soilLab.subtitle: Analyze your soil samples to get detailed insights and recommendations
soilLab.uploadDescription: Upload a clear photo of your soil sample for analysis
soilLab.uploadSoilMessage: Upload a soil sample image to get detailed analysis and recommendations
soilLab.analysisCompleted: Your soil analysis has been completed
soilLab.organicMatterLow: Low organic matter. Add compost or manure.
soilLab.organicMatterModerate: Moderate organic matter. Maintain with cover crops.
soilLab.organicMatterHigh: High organic matter. Excellent soil health.
soilLab.phAcidic: Acidic soil. Consider adding lime to raise pH.
soilLab.phNeutral: Neutral pH. Optimal for most crops.
soilLab.phAlkaline: Alkaline soil. Consider adding sulfur to lower pH.
soilLab.moistureLow: Low moisture retention. Add organic matter.
soilLab.sandyDescription: Sandy soil drains quickly but has poor nutrient retention.
soilLab.siltyDescription: Silty soil has good water retention and nutrient availability.
soilLab.clayDescription: Clay soil retains water and nutrients but can be poorly drained.
soilLab.loamyDescription: Loamy soil is ideal with balanced drainage and nutrient retention.
soilLab.defaultRecommendation: Add balanced fertilizer and maintain organic matter levels.
soilLab.moistureHistoryDescription: View historical soil moisture readings from your field
soilLab.errorLoadingHistory: Failed to load soil moisture history

cropAdvisor.title: Crop Advisor
cropAdvisor.recommendationsDescription: Based on your farm parameters, we've found suitable crops for your land.
cropAdvisor.errorDescription: There was an error generating recommendations. Please try again.
cropAdvisor.fillParametersMessage: Please fill in the farm parameters to get crop recommendations tailored to your land.
cropAdvisor.seeHowClimateAffectsCropChoices: See How Climate Affects Crop Choices

diseaseScan.title: AgroLab
diseaseScan.uploadMessage: Upload a clear photo of your plant for AI-powered disease detection
diseaseScan.fileTooLargeDescription: Please select an image smaller than 5MB
diseaseScan.uploadImageForDiseaseDetection: Upload an image of your plant for disease detection
diseaseScan.uploadImageForSoilAnalysis: Upload an image of your soil for analysis
diseaseScan.uploadImageForPestAnalysis: Upload an image for pest identification
diseaseScan.scanCropsDescription: Scan and identify crop diseases with AI-powered analysis

howItWorks.title: How AgroLab Works
howItWorks.description: Our AI-powered disease detection system helps you identify plant diseases quickly and accurately. Follow these simple steps:
howItWorks.step1: Take a clear photo of the affected plant part (leaf, stem, fruit, etc.)
howItWorks.step2: Upload the image using the upload button above
howItWorks.step3: Our AI will analyze the image and identify any diseases present
howItWorks.step4: Review the results and follow the recommended treatment options

market.title: Market Prices
market.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest market prices for agricultural commodities.
market.trendsDescription: Stay informed about the latest market trends and price movements for agricultural commodities.
market.forecastDescription: Based on current trends, prices are expected to remain stable with seasonal fluctuations.

agriBot.title: AgriBot AI Assistant
agriBot.assistantDescription: Our AI-powered farming assistant is here to help with all your agricultural questions. Use the chat button in the bottom right corner to start a conversation.
agriBot.clickToAsk: Click the chat icon to ask questions about farming, crops, soil, weather, and more!

capabilities.cropRecommendations: Crop recommendations based on soil type

agriBot.welcomeMessage: Hello {{name}}! Welcome back to SmartAgroX. How can I help with your farming today?
agriBot.genericWelcome: Hello! Welcome back to SmartAgroX. How can I help you today?
agriBot.signInPrompt: Please sign in to use the AgriBot assistant for personalized farming recommendations and advice.
agriBot.errorMessage: I'm sorry, I couldn't process your request. Please try again later.

voiceAssistant.title: Voice Assistant
voiceAssistant.error: There was an error recognizing your speech. Please try again.
voiceAssistant.browserNotSupported: Sorry, your browser doesn't support voice recognition.
voiceAssistant.processingError: There was an error processing your request. Please try again.

agroVision.title: AgroVision: Satellite Crop Health
agroVision.subtitle: Monitor your crop health with satellite-based vegetation index analytics
agroVision.noFarmsWarning: You need to create a farm first.
agroVision.mapDescription: View your farm fields with NDVI (vegetation health) overlay from satellite imagery.
agroVision.analyticsDescription: Historical vegetation health data and crop performance analytics.
agroVision.drawFields: Draw field boundaries on the map to generate NDVI analysis

homepage.agriBuddyDescription: Get personalized farming guidance with AI-generated crop cultivation plans, smart task management, weather-aware recommendations, and step-by-step journey tracking from planting to harvest!
homepage.farmManagementDescription: Monitor your farm health, detect diseases, analyze soil conditions, and get real-time insights with our AI-powered tools.
homepage.agriBuddyCardDescription: AI-powered crop journey assistant with smart farming guidance
homepage.farmManagementCardDescription: View and manage your farms with detailed analytics and recommendations
homepage.agroLabDescription: Scan and identify crop diseases with AI-powered analysis
homepage.pestAnalysisDescription: Identify and manage pest infestations with targeted solutions
homepage.soilAnalysisDescription: Check soil health, nutrients, and get personalized recommendations
homepage.uploadPhotoDescription: Upload a photo of your crop for AI analysis
